website_summaries.verdict: If you've been thinking about a Chromebook, HP's Chromebook 11 might be the one that sways you thanks to a slim and stylish design, lots of complimentary extras, and battery life to take you through the day.
pros: Lots of extras, like free Google Drive space, free music, and complimentary in-flight internet
Micro USB charging is an unexpected innovation
cons: Minimal port selection, even for a Chromebook
Performance lags slightly behind other models
Chrome OS still has some limitations

customer_reviews.title: and I like the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in Feb 2014, and was initially very impressed. It's light, very quick to boot up, and I like the keyboard. However, after a couple of months I experienced problems with the charger, so I had to purchase a new one. Now, only 7 months on, it's starting to freeze if I try to load more than a simple page.. ie something with a video or lots of adverts. I appreciate it's not that expensive, but if you need to replace it after less than a year, I can no longer recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great basic Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic Chromebook, which does exactly what I need. I wanted a laptop that would not be too bulky so I could take it into university with me. The Chromebook is great for that because I only need it to create documents on and to browse the internet. It does both of these things brilliantly. It is very fast and very quiet because there's no fan. It only works on wi-fi, but that's fine because I would only ever use it in places with wi-fi (although there are a number of functions that still work offline).
customer_reviews.author: MiniMe

customer_reviews.title: Nice HP Chrommebook 11...... warning....dangerous plugs.
customer_reviews.text: The plugs that come with the chrome books are the old design and there is a phone number you call to get your plug changed as they have been recalled due to the plugs over heating. They will send you out a new one but this can take up to 30 days, they advise you not to use the pug you have. I am still awaiting the new plug. I did try the present plug and yes they do get very hot, i would not leave the room with it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUI

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to !
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old Samsung NC10 Netbook with this HP Chromebook. Although different, it is much more flexible than our iPad, especially for text size changes, cut and pasting much is easier. Not serious changes if you use Google Chrome browser already. Had it a month now, and we love it ! We like the proper keyboard too. It looks elegant, and it appears rather well made. So we will call that a success then !
customer_reviews.author: David Culverhouse

customer_reviews.title: Magic chrome book
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Warehouse buy and I am really happy. Great little machine. Buy it if you like: - thin and really light - beautiful screen - great typing experience - super fast start-up, sleep & wake - simple browsing, webmail and other web based activities Maybe not if you want to do loads at the same time. The 2gb of RAM and processor will probably slow you down. Superb as a second machine and miles better than all those tablets if you actually need to get something done
customer_reviews.author: MJU

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Unsure whether to buy a tablet or laptop for my 11 year old, but am glad I decided on this. Very impressed with the range of free apps to download, especially the educational ones. So easy to set up and use. An ideal purchase for those who do not need or use all the capability of a laptop, but want a proper keyboard. What a great price - cheaper than replacing the ipod touch that has been very disappointing. We are not computer geeks so this product is ideal - nothing for us to upgrade or worry about. Lovely looking machine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs V A Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much so brilliant words fail me. Light weight not bulky and if you struggle as l do on laptops like me it is great because it helps you do stuff and guides the way. Looks like new no scratches at all. My teacher recommended one to me and l haven't looked back. About 3 to 3 and a half hours battery time but fine for me.😃😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: brilliant but battery management could be better.
customer_reviews.text: No doubt for users who want to play simple games (cards etc), browse the web, send emails this is a very good buy. Fast to start. I have not worked out whether you change the power configuration as if you just shut the cover it goes to standby but the battery still has a significant drain. Battery life is fine if you charge it daily but it would be nice to but it into shut down automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value! I got a supposedly scratched model through ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value! I got a supposedly scratched model through an Amazon reseller for £160. I couldn't find the scratch! These Chromebooks work right out of the box, particularly if you are already signed up. The screen on this compared to the Samsung is brilliant. For a lot of people with Microsoft Skydrive [renamed Onedrive] as well as Google Docs and pretty well instant access to the internet if you have wi-fi you have a premium PC experience. Everything saved in the Cloud. Trouble free, anxiety free computing - what's not to like? The future has arrived!
customer_reviews.author: RR Marriott

customer_reviews.title: This things is fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: Superb little laptop for web use. We have a desktop upstairs and wanted a little laptop for general web use. This things is fantastic for the price. Super fast start up/sgit shut down (thanks to SSD) no faffing around installing stuff/formatting etc etc just WORKS. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my Chromebook, considering getting another as this one's been hijacked by my partner. The charger cord is slightly fiddly & gets quite hot. Had to get it replaced when a pin broke in the plug that attaches to the computer. Google helpline were helpful and accommodating, so not a problem really. Practically impossible to get a high power enough replacement otherwise though. Will probably go for one with a standard charge cable next time, but we'll definitely be getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Soph E Phaux

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical at first, no operating software, but i can safely say this little machine is worth its weight in gold. It starts up in less than 6 seconds and i have never had to revert to my laptop as tehre are lots of apps that do the same as OS would on a laptop. Battery life is brilliant over 6 six hours for surfing or 3-4 when watching movies. A cracking machine.
customer_reviews.author: ExMover?

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.. couldn't ask for a better one
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic.. couldn't ask for a better one!! best chrome book.. the speaker is louder than the samsung one.. and the resolution is better and crisper.. I just wish that it had other colours available here in the UK.. as I have two of the same one and would've liked another colour for it..
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of the chromebook, and seems to last forever. Not a fan on the keyboard, enter key is a bit small and cut off in such a way that I keep hitting the # key. Would have been a 5 if it wasn't for the (almost) melting charger.
customer_reviews.author: John Bowen

customer_reviews.title: At first all worked good, I was satisfied with that product
customer_reviews.text: I've bought recently HP Chromebook 11. At first all worked good, I was satisfied with that product. Everything was in good condition. However after 2 moths one day when I wanted to turn it on, I just couldn't. I couldn't even return the item because it was no longer eligible for return. The return window closed on 11 Sep(only one month eligible, quite short time, especially if chromebook broke down one month after return expire date.) I can't recommend that product.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Pociecha

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy... Major fault with device Amazon won't replace it despite product recall in USA. Disgusting customer care from Amazon Management.
customer_reviews.author: Rob UK

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product that does everything that was required
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product that does everything that was required. It is small, light and easily moveable. It is quick and does all the web based stuff you expect from a Chromebook. The price really was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Nice dual boot to ubuntu
customer_reviews.text: One of the main reasons I bought this machine was to ssh into my office. I basically wanted a light cheap dumb terminal with a reasonable keyboard and screen. The HP ssh functionality is fine, but soon after receiving the device I discovered its a pretty trivial matter to install ubuntu onto the device as a dual boot. That works really nicely for me.
customer_reviews.author: JasonT

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook 11 is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that connected to the internet quickly and gave me a stable connection with fast response and that is what the chromebook does. It is possibly not the best thing in the world for other things but purely as a fast response communicator it is ace. The price is the decider.
customer_reviews.author: william baker

customer_reviews.title: 3-inch Chromebook the past two months which is great.
customer_reviews.text: Crashed out on three ocassions with no explanation and got a refund. Have had a Asus C300MA 13.3-inch Chromebook the past two months which is great.
customer_reviews.author: St. George

customer_reviews.title: super little machine despite how basic it is
customer_reviews.text: super little machine despite how basic it is, great for having around the house and even more so for travelling, mush more practical than a tablet if you need to do some real stuff asides from browsing
customer_reviews.author: Neilers

customer_reviews.title: HP makes decent computer shock
customer_reviews.text: I like to type, and a tablet is useless for me. The HP Chromebook 11 is therefore ideal. Slim, light yet rigid, it just works well. The hardware side of it is comparable to an Apple, and it feels great to use. Not the most powerful of tools, but for two hundred quid what do you expect? One thing though, if you're not able to sign up the Googleworld a Chromebook isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Ross

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I ever owned. period. For all the things you can NOT do on it. I'm an architect, so I use several cad and adobe programs...on my other laptop. Which is heavy. Takes a cup of coffee to start up. Needs maintenance. All good, let it be...let it be at the office. This one is everywhere I go..super light...lean, fast, simple. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mathijs

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price just check chargers for faults!
customer_reviews.text: Great price so bought 2 one had gone up in price by £15 one has US set keyboard which I need to change also there are some faulty chargers that overheat which Hp replaced free of charge and one was 1 year old the other wasn't overall very pleased with product and no noticeable marks or damage
customer_reviews.author: Lee Doyle

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous really love it!!
customer_reviews.text: is fast light and looks great!! some off the other chromebooks look a little cheap (had a look in a few shops) this one looks great and works perfectly! is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have asked for a better little laptop. Fits discretely into a handbag, weighs nothing and is so fast. Battery life is brilliant, I would highly recommend this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: HP Chromebook 11
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gadget. I find it easier and quicker to use than our Dell laptop. It does every thing I need, I can access Skydrive to work on Office 365 and if I want to work offline I can use Google Docs. It's light to carry around and it looks good too! For the price it's a great buy. SEE COMMENT........
customer_reviews.author: cinzia_p

customer_reviews.title: This has become my favorite computer. It's not fast
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite computer. It's not fast, but for simple tasks it's great Monitor and keyboard is much better than expected at this price level Open too many tabs and the machine gets sluggish; in general, videos work good enough, even HD ..... Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Harald Nipen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook is great - use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: great batter life etc
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected, great batter life etc. Precisely that a Chromebook is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook is great
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my new Chromebook. It is so easy to set up and use and also loads much more quickly than a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiepat

customer_reviews.title: Best value ever!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement for my slow and cumbersome windows 8 laptop. The HP11 has been a revelation! Beautifully made, fast, virus-free, great display-much prefer it to friends macbooks-which now look old-fashioned in comparison. Only complaint-can't find scrabble app!
customer_reviews.author: kimbo

customer_reviews.title: Google is not that helpful as I was amazed to find out
customer_reviews.text: HP Chromebook has had a problem with the on/off switch. HP refers you on to Google. Google is not that helpful as I was amazed to find out. Thanks to Amazon will be able to hand it back now; thanks Amazon, not so well done Google!
customer_reviews.author: Uwe Spelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: HP Chromebook 11 review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of hardware. Initially i bought this for my wife for a backup machine, now it has replaced the i7-Acer completely. Portability and screen are the best selling points of this laptop. Only downside was the charger"gate".
customer_reviews.author: Mikko Rantala

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Charging port broke after about a month and the device became useless, secound time this has happened to this product
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: HP Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop/chrome. Smooth running {if at times can be quite sensitive to the touch} Everything about it is TOPS. Just one exception, will not support certain APPS which I personally think is a let down for my requirements. As a warehouse deal it is value for money.
customer_reviews.author: sabala

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific piece of kit. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Boots up in an instant. Light and thin, easy to transport and looks good. Ideal for surfing and emailing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who's 7 as it's a chromebook there's no need to buy extra security as it's built in its an excellent little laptop
customer_reviews.author: ninja

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: My second Chromebook and very happy, (my daughter's nabbed the first).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellant
customer_reviews.text: great computer. build quality is excelllant. does every thing i want, very pleased. would highly reconmend. go buy one now
customer_reviews.author: howie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought on July the 24th 2014 now not charging cost to much to repair don't buy one
customer_reviews.author: michael hurst

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it breaks far too soon
customer_reviews.text: Nice chromebook but not good quality. After less than 6 month it fails to charge and is a mere doorstop.
customer_reviews.author: H. Dürer

customer_reviews.title: access to internet and useful apps.
customer_reviews.text: Really quick, simple start up, access to internet and useful apps.
customer_reviews.author: kathy szota

customer_reviews.title: fantastic battery life too
customer_reviews.text: Slightly slow laptop but gorgeous screen and design, fantastic battery life too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brown

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of kit - Works amazingly fast, has a great screen and is really sleek. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Lily lockey

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop On The Move
customer_reviews.text: Light, loads quick, looks great, great for email and web browsing. Ideal for the businessman on his travels. It also gets regular updates and there's lots of apps available.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mullings

customer_reviews.title: Fast and light, It is really a good solution to stay connected with the cloud
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it as a secure and easy way to access to all your services in the cloud and the price is incredible
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Compact machine
customer_reviews.text: A nice easy machine to use and with a small footprint so that it takes up little space. Enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A decent bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Received my chrome book today, I like it very much . It is the fastest pc i have used probably because all it is a big web browser. However don't let that put you off,you can do other stuff on it also such as office documentation via google docs play games download apps etc. The design is very good very lightweight nice screen display and very good keyboard. But i like it because its quick and i mean quick no waiting around. First turn on it downloads an update then you can start using it with your google account or make an account. I think to be honest this is better than a tablet pc.
customer_reviews.author: LJ93

customer_reviews.title: pure Gold
customer_reviews.text: Having originally bought the Samsung version which was 1 year old I decided to update to the latest version. I wasn't disappointed with this and have recommended it to a friend who bought one too . Unfortunately I had issues with the size of screen, nothing to do with the product more "of an age "thing so decided to return to a large screen laptop. This has no reflection on this product which I thought was SUPER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Neil

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Design
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Chromebook I have bought. While I love the design, like the lightness and love the phone charger point removing the need to cart a large brick around it isn't as fast as the Acer C720. The Acer C720 is blisteringly quick on start up and the battery lasts longer. So in summary, the Acer C720 is faster, has better battery life but the HP just shades it as it has a better screen, is lighter, and looks so damned nice. I was tempted to swap with the person I gifted the C720 to but on balance I will keep the HP11. I am very much sold on the Chromebook concept as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. M. Pass

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Why? It's beautiful. It's very light. It makes no noise. It has a pleasant touch. It can be charged via USB. It does all you can expect of a Chromebook. Bottom line: This is great for home and travel, provided you have a good internet connection. Yes, there are more powerful machines out there, but you pay for that in price, noise, and weight. PS: I'm an Apple fanboy and I'm glad to see that finally great design has become affordable.
customer_reviews.author: pauls01

customer_reviews.title: Its not windows
customer_reviews.text: Well, I am a Google lover and in agreement with nearly all the other reviews, essentially its fast, cheap, and it does'nt run Windows so no AV update issues, windows service packs and updates etc As long as you understand its limitations it is a great piece of kit. The only negative I can find is that in certain light the screen is a bit reflective. Still 5 stars as it does what its says on the tin..
customer_reviews.author: Labowski

customer_reviews.title: A steal at £179.99
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need Windows (everything you want to accomplish has to be done in a browser) and don't mind creating a Google account this is an attractive, light laptop with a great screen for £179.99. Don't hesitate. Only downside is battery life is average for a new laptop at around 6 hours and whilst it isn't slow it's not as spritely as the Intel based Chromebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Xrissy

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook works quite well, limited but quick. I have used an optical mouse rather than the pad. I found yesterday that my mouse had ceased to function, so I bought another one. That did not work. I tried 2 more optical mouse, and a standard wired mouse that do work on other computers, so the malfunction is in the Chromebook. I am now beyond the 30 day return period, so apparently cannot return for a replacement or a refund. It will be an irritant as long as I have to use it without a mouse. What can I do ??????
customer_reviews.author: odjobb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little machine
customer_reviews.text: The Hp Chromebook 11 is the perfect small laptop for casual users and Linux geeks alike: small, light, with a gorgeous IPS screen, and comfortable keyboard and touchpad. Chrome OS has matured a lot in the past few months, and if you feel limited and have some Linux skills you can always install Crouton and use a "proper" Linux distribution alongside Google's OS. The only things I'm missing are a decent code editor (tried lots), and support for more audio codecs.
customer_reviews.author: ludo

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for browsing the internet to read articles...
customer_reviews.text: But that's it, it struggles to play videos fluidly and and scrolling is laggy. The design is beautiful though and it's just the right size. Impressive sound through the keyboard and the keyboard is very pleasant to use. All in all though, a very under powered piece of kit that'll just about get you by.
customer_reviews.author: Julian P. Outram

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook 11
customer_reviews.text: Still getting to grips with not screen touch again anymore, but finding Chromebook 11 good to carry and use. Downside being it is not IOS and very restricted to synchronizing with iPhone and Kindle even though assured by manufacturers that they made them all
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Chrome book
customer_reviews.text: This chrome book worked fine I have had it for 3 months but the charger is broken and is rubbish and now have to pay £20 for a new one I can't get one for free because I bought it in February and apparently the faulty chargers were before December 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G.

customer_reviews.title: excellent size and weight just what my mum wanted
customer_reviews.text: This chromebook is user friendly, excellent size and weight just what my mum wanted. Fantastic little product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wright

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, except for charging issues
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, good battery life - an excellent example of a Chromebook. However, it's not getting five stars because the charger broke a few weeks after purchase, and the Chromebook had some issues with charging outside of that.
customer_reviews.author: LynkStar

customer_reviews.title: It's not the charger as that's working fine. I would appreciate it if you could get ...
customer_reviews.text: To the seller.. I purchased this item from you and apologise for not leaving a review sooner as everything was working perfectly. However I was using my notebook the other day and it shut down and wouldn't start up again. It's not the charger as that's working fine. I would appreciate it if you could get back to me please as I need my chrome book. Thank you Isobel
customer_reviews.author: Isobel Leclaire

customer_reviews.title: A new experience that opens your mind
customer_reviews.text: When you use a ChromeBook you think: "How could I use such a complicated and slow technology before?". ChromeBooks are the future, whitout an doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Emiliano Pollazzon

customer_reviews.title: HP Chromebook 11
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty device for web browsing, shopping & social media. Not as useful as a laptop if you want to write letters , print things off or use skype but I haven't had time to explore all of google's versions of things yet.
customer_reviews.author: justine walshe

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son is overjoyed with this present as his last notebook was taken by my granddaughter to her new home think you for prompt delivery was supposed to be scratched but condition was perfect for his usage
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brown

customer_reviews.title: HP Chromebook 11
customer_reviews.text: Feels well made, actually a beautiful package, the screen is awesome but unfortunately the displayed failed after less than 4 weeks, started flashing on and off one day then failed completely the next. Notice that other people have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought the chromebook thinking it would be wonderful when it arrived, and after waiting in for two days for the courier to bring my laptop, as soon as I opened the box and plugged it in I realised it was not charging and unable to turn on. Never being so disappointed! Would not recommend buying a high priced item on here. After speaking with amazon they said I could have a refund if I sent it back, which I have but it cost me £15, ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: abbie ingham

customer_reviews.title: *NOT* US layout as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Have just received my Chromebook 11 & it does NOT have a US layout keyboard as shown in the pictures. It has a UK layout with an extremely narrow enter key.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Davies

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON AFTER SALES SERVICE LESS THAN USELESS
customer_reviews.text: The charger has stopped working properly less than 2 months since I bought it. Amazon just sent me to the manufacturer's website and I drew a further blank. I have decided to buy electronic products from a reputable electronics store in future, because if any after sales support is needed, Amazon are not interested. In fact I may stop shopping from them completely
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: laptop refuses to turn on with and without the charger in the laptop! No sustainability most likely manufactured to break after a short period. I am left feeling very bitter about my purchase. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Loro

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Surf the lightweighter netbook!
customer_reviews.text: First Approach is too smoother easiness access. Enjoy our temporary netbook rather than higher rates laptop excepts Macbook's Users as applied. An emergency to lower rates the Netbook can covered all damaged & breakdown laptop across the UK's consumers saved the wasteful materials cost each seconds per day.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Firaas Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months my Chromebook does not work any more. It takes ages to turn on is only showing a black screen. Don't waste your money and go for a proper laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Mendez

product_meta.title: HP Chromebook 11
product_meta.description:
HP CHROMEBOOK 11-1126UK -- MADE WITH GOOGLE
KEY SPECIFICATIONS
11.6" screen | 2GB memory | 16GB hard drive | VGA camera 

LEAN AND LIGHT
The sleek and refined form is thin and lightweight, making connecting from almost anywhere convenient and stylish.

VIEW FROM ALMOST ANY ANGLE
Side-by-side multi-tasking and sharing is easy with the 27.9cm (11-inch) diagonal wide viewing angle display, providing clear images and no colour shift using IPS technology.

QUICK START
Boots up quickly and is ready to access your online content and automatically and regularly updated apps.

THIS PRODUCT HAS
WIRELESS
 802.11a/b/g/n (2x2); Bluetooth 

IMAGE GALLERY

 Operating System 
Google Chrome 

 Processor 
Samsung Exynos 5 Dual (1.7 GHz) 

 Memory, Standard 
2 GB 1600 MHz DDR3L SDRAM (onboard) 

 Display 
29.5 cm (11.6") diagonal IPS HD LED-backlit (1366 x 768) 

 Product Colour 
Piano white with blue accent 



BOX CONTAINS
1 x HP Chromebook 2GB RAM
16GB eMMC Hard drive
Samsung Exynos 5 Dual (1.7 GHz)
Google Chrome notebook (Piano white with blue accent)
15.75W AC power adapter
Instruction manual
feature_bullets: Features a powerful Samsung Exynos 5 Dual 1.7 GHz processor
Front-facing VGA webcam with integrated digital microphone
29.4 cm (11.6-inch) diagonal IPS HD LED-backlit (1366 x 768) display
